name: Drop In The Bucket
description:
Drop in the Bucket was deloveloped in 2006 using Visual Basic 6.0. It was one of the first programs I coded and designed, and always reminds me how far I have come as an Indie dev. I'm considering a remake or a sequal, redone in either flash or gamemaker. But, till then enjoy.

controls:

Use A & D to move

It also includes a save feature that allows you to keep your top 10 scores saved locally to your c drive.
